commit.message:
re PR middle-end/11397 (weak aliases broken on Tru64 UNIX)


	PR middle-end/11397
	* varasm.c (assemble_alias): Remove weak aliases from weak_decls.

	* gcc.dg/special/wkali-2.c: Add dg-require-alias.

From-SVN: r75737
